title: PMS 2.0 546 - NFL Thanksgiving Recap & NFL Week 12 Preview With Coach Jason Brown & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show Pat, AJ, and the boys chat about yesterday's NFL Thanksgiving slate and how the Lions and Bears both stink, Shawn Hocculi took over the Cowboys Raiders game, and the Bills might be back after a resounding win in New Orleans. Plus, Pat and AJ hop around the NFL and look at all the major storylines as we head in week 12 of the NFL season before they make their picks against the spread. Later, Netflix Legend of Last Chance U fame, Coach Jason Brown joins Pat and AJ to chat about rivalry week in college football, what's been pissing him off as of late, and he gives his picks for this weekend's games including Michigan vs. Ohio State (1:23:23-1:53:31). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
